repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:2.7 
MAINTAINER David A. Lareo <dalareo@gmail.com> 

EXPOSE 8000 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y gettext npm nodejs nodejs-legacy && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN mkdir /code 
WORKDIR /code 
RUN mkdir static-libs 

VOLUME ["/code"] 

ADD requirements.txt /code/ 
ADD postgresql-requirements.txt /code/ 
ADD configuration.py-default /code/configuration.py 

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r postgresql-requirements.txt

ADD . /code 

RUN ./manage.py init
